title: BARD - Depp Heard Updates and The Sussmann Trial Starts
itunes:title: BARD - Depp Heard Updates and The Sussmann Trial Starts
description:
Adam and Mark connect to discuss the latest in the Johnny Depp Amber Heard circus as well as covering the opening of Michael Sussmann's case, the first brought in the three years since John Durham was appointed by then Attorney General William Barr.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
